news.author: John Kruzel
news.description:
A judge in Kentucky on Monday night revived the state’s near-total ban on abortion, the latest legal development following the U.S. Supreme Court’s overturning of Roe v. Wade.

The ruling by a state a...
news.title: Kentucky judge revives state's near-total abortion ban

news.author: cnbc
news.description: WASHINGTON -- House Speaker Nancy Pelosi landed in Taiwan's capital of Taipei on Tuesday night, kicking off a controversial visit that had already strained the testy relationship between Beijing and Washington before it even began.
news.title: China ratchets up military and economic pressure on Taiwan as Pelosi begins her visit
